[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [EnvironmentConfiguration](./rush-lib.environmentconfiguration.md)

## EnvironmentConfiguration class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Provides Rush-specific environment variable data. All Rush environment variables must start with "RUSH\_". This class is designed to be used by RushConfiguration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class EnvironmentConfiguration 
```

## Remarks

Initialize will throw if any unknown parameters are present.
